meanings.definition: The action or method of storing something.
meanings.sent1: Proper storage of food helps prevent spoilage.
meanings.sent2: The warehouse has ample storage for all our inventory.
meanings.sent3: I tried using my shoes as storage for snacks, but it didn't work well.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a storage of memories, each carefully filed away.
meanings.sent5: The storage of books in the library was organized by genre for easy access.

meanings.sent1: The attic provides extra storage for seasonal decorations.
meanings.sent2: The storage in the garage is full of old furniture.
meanings.sent3: His backpack seemed to have endless storage for all his gadgets.
meanings.sent4: The storage in the pantry was like a puzzle, fitting everything just right.
meanings.sent5: The storage under the bed was a treasure trove of forgotten toys.

meanings.definition: The retention of retrievable data on a computer or other electronic system.
meanings.sent1: Cloud storage allows you to access your files from anywhere.
meanings.sent2: The storage on my phone is almost full from all the photos.
meanings.sent3: His brain felt like a storage of random facts, ready to be recalled at any moment.
meanings.sent4: The storage of information in the database was secure and organized.
meanings.sent5: The storage of passwords in a safe place is crucial for online security.
